item.title: CVE-2021-39327|2024-09-17T02:33:07.649Z -- aitpro -- bulletproof%20security
item.description: The BulletProof Security WordPress plugin is vulnerable to sensitive information disclosure due to a file path disclosure in the publicly accessible ~/db_backup_log.txt file which grants attackers the full path of the site, in addition to the path of database backup files. This affects versions up to, and including, 5.1.
